changes: Implemented touch control, which works on mobile devices by default or can be force enabled in settings.
Added UI click sound for buttons.
Overhauled main menu with new game logo and News tab (contents WIP).
Added loading screen with useful tips.
Added dev console menu which can be accessed by pressing [~] while game is paused.
Fixed an issue with volume sliders which used to handle SFX volume incorrectly.
Added settings menu with music and sfx volume sliders.
Improved UI background with gradient variations.
Added proper main menu along with the Changes tab (YOU ARE HERE :D).
Added The Ship upgrade which can be achieved by destroying 50 meteors.
Upgrade increases player speed, laser capacity, recharge speed and decreases reload time.
Meteor spawn speed was slightly adjusted.
Fixed a bug when meteor counter didn't reset after restart.
